entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 15 February 2023
